thread.title: President Donald Trump's new immigration policy raises questions, creates dilemmas for Northeast Ohioans
thread.title_full: President Donald Trump's new immigration policy raises questions, creates dilemmas for Northeast Ohioans

author: Brian Albrecht, The Plain Dealer
title: President Donald Trump's new immigration policy raises questions, creates dilemmas for Northeast Ohioans
text: President Donald Trump's executive order on immigrants and refugees has placed some Northeast Ohioans in a confusing limbo of uncertainty.
